attributes.action: Prevention of GCHQ access to communications on demand. Which allows access to our personal emails and internet records
attributes.additional_details:
A petition to prevent the government from creating legislation, that compromises the privacy of Internet and communication users in the UK.

The focus being on a revised bill that will prevent the GCHQ access to individuals data and information without their consent and/or knowledge (in the form of a warrant for an ongoing investigation).
